index.description: It is mainly used as a callback for an event to identify the item that was clicked
index.description_zh: 主要用于事件的回调，标识那个Item被点击

disabled.description: Whether the panel can be opened or collapsed
disabled.description_zh: 面板是否可以打开或收起

open.description: Sets whether the initial state of a panel is open
open.description_zh: 设置某个面板的初始状态是否打开

name.description: If the unique identifier is not set, the index value of the current collapse-item is used by default
name.description_zh: 唯一标识符，如不设置，默认用当前collapse-item的索引值

active-style.description: When the arrows are not displayed, you can add the currently selected collapse-item activity style, object form
active-style.description_zh: 不显示箭头时，可以添加当前选择的collapse-item活动样式，对象形式

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when an item is opened or collapsed
events.description_zh: 某个item被打开或者收起时触发
events.params: 对象，{index: index, show: true | false }，index为collapse-item的index参数，show为true表示被打开，false表示被收起

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the main body

slots.name: title
slots.description: The contents of the head, excluding the arrow on the right
slots.description_zh: 头部的内容，不含右边的箭头

slots.name: title-all
slots.description: The entire head, including the arrow on the right
slots.description_zh: 整个头部的内容，包含右边的箭头
